column1: * 1918 - J.R.R. Tolkien attends a medical board examination.  He is found to be fit for general service.
* 1969 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes a Letter to Mrs Mroczkowska (10 April 1969).
* 1991 – The Revised Edition of Karen Wynn Fonstads The Atlas of Middle-earth is published.
* 2018 - HarperCollins announce that The Fall of Gondolin will be published on 30 August 2018.
** Eorl and the Éothéod travel towards the Field of Celebrant.Category:Datesfi:10. huhtikuuta
